translations: n.豌豆（粒）；豆角；<西印度>豆荚

phrs.translation: n. [植]香豌豆；[植]麝香豌豆花

sentences.sentence: The tumour had shrunk to the size of a pea.
sentences.translation: 肿瘤已缩小到豌豆大小。

sentences.sentence: Each pea and peach on the beach can be reached by the peacock.
sentences.translation: 海滩上的每一颗豌豆和桃子孔雀都能触及。

sentences.sentence: You will learn how to cook a pea soup and a curd biscuit with raisins.
sentences.translation: 你将学习如何煮豌豆汤和葡萄干凝乳饼干。
